nodes.text: This handmaiden was present at a spaceport on the planet Raxus Secundus around 21 BBY.

She and another handmaiden worked for Separatist Mina Bonteri and helped Padawan Ahsoka Tano and Senator Padmé Amidala get past the droid controls by distracting the droid's attention. She was later seen traveling with Bonteri to her house.
